meta.title: Saint Discovery Quiz - Find Your Patron Saint | Catholic Personality Quiz
meta.description: Discover which Catholic Saint resonates with your personality through our AI-powered quiz. Answer 12 thoughtful questions to find your patron saint match from 135+ saints.

landing.title: Saint Discovery Quiz
landing.subtitle: Discover which Catholic Saint resonates with your spirit
landing.intro1: Take our free Catholic saint personality quiz to discover which patron saint best matches your spiritual journey. Our AI-powered saint quiz analyzes your answers to 12 thoughtful questions and matches you with one of 135+ Catholic saints based on your unique personality, values, and faith journey.
landing.intro2: Whether you're seeking spiritual guidance, looking for a patron saint, or simply curious about which saint's life story resonates with yours, this quiz provides personalized insights powered by artificial intelligence.

q1.question: When facing a difficult problem, what is your first instinct?
q1.a1: Study and research until I fully understand every aspect
q1.a2: Take immediate action to address the situation
q1.a3: Pray and reflect, trusting that guidance will come
q1.a4: Reach out to help others who may be affected

q2.question: How do you find the most meaning in your daily life?
q2.a1: Through quiet moments of prayer and reflection
q2.a2: By serving others and meeting their needs
q2.a3: Through learning, reading, and expanding my understanding
q2.a4: By creating beauty in the world through art, music, or nature

q3.question: When you see someone being treated unfairly, how do you respond?
q3.a1: Speak up immediately, even if it's uncomfortable
q3.a2: Quietly support the person and offer help privately
q3.a3: Work to change systems and structures that cause injustice
q3.a4: Pray for the situation and all involved

q4.question: What type of environment helps you feel closest to God?
q4.a1: In nature - forests, mountains, or near water
q4.a2: In a quiet chapel or during adoration
q4.a3: While actively serving others in need
q4.a4: In community with others, sharing faith together

q5.question: How would you describe your approach to personal challenges?
q5.a1: I persevere steadily, trusting it will work out in time
q5.a2: I face them head-on with determination and courage
q5.a3: I look for lessons and growth opportunities in every trial
q5.a4: I offer up my suffering and unite it with Christ's

q6.question: What role do you naturally take in a group setting?
q6.a1: The leader who organizes and guides others
q6.a2: The quiet supporter who ensures everyone's needs are met
q6.a3: The teacher or mentor who shares knowledge
q6.a4: The encourager who brings joy and peace

q7.question: What draws you most when learning about a saint's life?
q7.a2: Their courage in the face of persecution
q7.a3: Their humble service to the poor and suffering
q7.a4: Their deep mystical prayer life and visions

q8.question: How do you prefer to express your faith?
q8.a1: Through studying Scripture and Church teachings
q8.a2: Through works of mercy and charitable actions
q8.a4: Through sharing my faith with others openly

q9.question: What is your greatest strength?
q9.a1: My ability to understand complex ideas and explain them clearly
q9.a2: My compassion and desire to help those who are suffering
q9.a3: My courage to stand firm in my beliefs no matter the cost
q9.a4: My patience and ability to trust in God's timing

q10.question: Which of these callings resonates most with you?
q10.a1: Bringing the Gospel to people who haven't heard it
q10.a2: Creating a haven of peace and prayer
q10.a3: Standing up for truth in public life
q10.a4: Caring for the sick, poor, or marginalized

q11.question: How do you handle times when your faith is tested?
q11.a1: I dig deeper into study and seek understanding
q11.a2: I increase my prayer and time in silence with God
q11.a3: I reach out to serve others, finding purpose in giving
q11.a4: I hold fast to what I believe, trusting through darkness

q12.question: What legacy would you most want to leave behind?
q12.a1: Writings or teachings that help others understand the faith
q12.a2: A community or organization that serves those in need
q12.a3: The example of a life lived with courage and conviction
q12.a4: Having inspired others through simple acts of love

userInfo.title: One Last Step!
userInfo.subtitle: We'll match you with a saint of the same gender. Please select your gender to see your personalized result.

loading.analyzing: Analyzing your spiritual journey with AI...
loading.wait: This may take a few moments

results.inspirationalQuote: "Be who God meant you to be and you will set the world on fire."

allSaints.subtitle: Browse our complete directory of saints with their feast days, patronages, and virtues
allSaints.searchPlaceholder: Search saints by name, patronage, or virtue...

byVirtue.title: Saints by Virtue
byVirtue.subtitle: Discover Catholic saints organized by their defining virtues and spiritual qualities

byCentury.title: Saints Through the Centuries
byCentury.subtitle: Journey through 2000 years of faith with saints from every era of Church history

intellectual.title: Intellectual & Scholarly
intellectual.description: Saints known for their pursuit of knowledge, theological writings, and educational contributions

contemplative.title: Contemplative & Mystical
contemplative.description: Saints devoted to prayer, meditation, and deep spiritual experiences

service.title: Charitable & Service-Oriented
service.description: Saints who dedicated their lives to serving the poor, sick, and marginalized

leadership.title: Leadership & Reform
leadership.description: Saints who led movements, reformed institutions, and inspired change

missionary.title: Missionary & Evangelical
missionary.description: Saints who spread the faith across cultures and continents

courage.title: Courageous & Martyrs
courage.description: Saints who showed extraordinary bravery, often unto death for their faith

humble.title: Humble & Simple
humble.description: Saints characterized by humility, simplicity, and childlike faith

family.title: Family & Community
family.description: Saints known for their devotion to family life, children, and building community

transformation.title: Transformation & Conversion
transformation.description: Saints whose lives demonstrate dramatic conversion and the power of redemption

creative.title: Creative & Artistic
creative.description: Saints who expressed their faith through art, music, poetry, and appreciation of nature

mercy.title: Merciful & Loving
mercy.description: Saints who exemplified divine mercy and unconditional love

biblical.title: Biblical & Angelic
biblical.description: The Holy Family, Apostles, and Heavenly beings

earlyChurch.title: Early Church & Martyrs
earlyChurch.description: The age of persecution and the Church Fathers

medievalEarly.title: Early Medieval
medievalEarly.description: Monasticism spreads and shapes European civilization

medievalHigh.title: High Medieval
medievalHigh.description: The golden age of scholasticism and mendicant orders

lateMedieval.title: Late Medieval & Renaissance
lateMedieval.description: Mystics, reformers, and the dawn of new horizons

counterReformation.title: Counter-Reformation
counterReformation.description: The age of great founders and missionaries

modernEarly.title: Early Modern
modernEarly.description: Saints of education, charity, and social justice

contemporary.title: Contemporary Saints
contemporary.description: Saints who lived in our modern world, facing its unique challenges
